name: Friends Beyond the End
description:
Game is based on a mechanic which allows you to use your "dead bodies" as game objects making them crucial to complete all the levels. Die wisely.

A little puzzle game made for Brackeys GameJam 2020 with theme "Rewind" in period of one week. I used some graphics from "Free platformer pack", but I can ensure You that all the scripts, animations and levels were made by me. Any type of feedback will be appreciated! Have fun! 

Solution video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KbBYkKYUwg0
